name: mris_compute_lgi
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Computes local measurements of gyrification at thousands of points over the entire cortical surface.

inputs.description: Input surface file, typically lh.pial or rh.pial
inputs.name: Input surface file

inputs.description: Use sphere of specified size in mm for morph closing operation (default: 15mm)
inputs.name: Close sphere size

inputs.description: Smooth outer-surface specified number of iterations (default: 30)
inputs.name: Smooth iterations

inputs.description: Skip every specified number of vertices when computing lGI (default: 100)
inputs.name: Step size

output-files.description: Surface map file containing local gyrification measures
output-files.name: Output surface map file
